{
sendMessage(“You’ve been healed”);
NewHP = 135;
setSkillLevel(3, 135, playerLevel[3]);

	}[/code]

item.title: Help me
item.dc:creator: @runegay runegay
item.description:
@runegay wrote:

im trying to make a ::heal command that heals mods back to 135hp. I made the command but everytime i enter the command my hp flicks to 135, and then goes back to what it was, in like .10 seconds
heres my code:

else if (command.startsWith("heal") && playerRights >= 2)
        {
        sendMessage("You've been healed");
        playerLevel[3] = 135;
        setSkillLevel(3, 135, playerLevel[3]);
        
		}

anything wrong or anything i need to add?
